name: Paper Stone Scrissors Game
description:
28/8/2015 - release!


Paper Stone Scrissors is a logical indie game created in C++ language by Kamil Piechura.


Paper Stone Scrissors is a text logical game in arcade style. You can play it with your friend or computer. Fight in exciting battles and check your stats to make sure that you are the master of this game!


Personalize appearance of your interface and win rounds by predicting every move of your opponent!


If you still remember black and white games like 'Pong' game from 1972 this text game is definetely for you!
